description:
Karin`s job well done has turned into a disaster! The DNA Control Medicine was supposed to rid Junta of his lady-killer genes, but instead she`s accidentally forced him to become the legendary "Mega-Playboy"! Worse yet, he`s already begun his conquest, starting with Tomoko, the most popular girl in Junta`s school. But Tomoko`s already got Ryuji, and her boyfriend`s not afraid to let Junta know it.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Junta, The Birth of The Mega-Playboy
メガプレ誕生! 純太
